explains: n. 自力更生，依靠自己；自恃

sentences.en: One must not go to extremes in applying the principle of self-reliance.
sentences.cn: 不要把自力更生绝对化。

sentences.en: The increasing self-reliance of many elderly people is probably linked to a massive increase in the use of simple home medical aids.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人越来越能依靠自己生活，这可能与简单家庭医疗设备的使用大量增加有关。

sentences.en: Remember this is 1838, "Self-Reliance" was a novel idea at the time and the United States citizens were less secure about themselves as individuals and as Americans.
sentences.cn: 记住这是在1838年，“自力更生”在当时是一个新奇的概念，美国公民对他们自己作为个人和作为美国人的安全感较低。
